about_the_game:
Relive the most ambitious battle in Viking history. Sail to the war-torn kingdom of Frankia and besiege the fortified city of Paris. Fight the merciless forces of Charles the Fat and form strategic alliances to safeguard your clan’s future.

Continue your Viking saga with The Siege of Paris:
- Infiltrate the fortified walls of ninth-century Paris
- Aid the resistance against the Carolingian Empire
- Explore the lush Frankish countryside and sail the iconic Seine River
- Assassinate key enemies in open-ended quests

Upgrade to the season pass for instant access to Wrath of the Druids and The Siege of Paris expansions, PLUS The Legend of Beowulf bonus quest!
detailed_description:
Relive the most ambitious battle in Viking history. Sail to the war-torn kingdom of Frankia and besiege the fortified city of Paris. Fight the merciless forces of Charles the Fat and form strategic alliances to safeguard your clan’s future.

Continue your Viking saga with The Siege of Paris:
- Infiltrate the fortified walls of ninth-century Paris
- Aid the resistance against the Carolingian Empire
- Explore the lush Frankish countryside and sail the iconic Seine River
- Assassinate key enemies in open-ended quests

Upgrade to the season pass for instant access to Wrath of the Druids and The Siege of Paris expansions, PLUS The Legend of Beowulf bonus quest!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (versions 64 bits uniquement)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 3.1 GHz / Intel Core i5-4460 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 380 /NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (versions 64 bits uniquement)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 3.2 GHz / Intel Core i7-4790 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 380 /NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
